Description: Two joining fragments of Attic black-glazed pottery lekanis, with root of reflex handle; wholly black glazed, though very worn on exterior; on inside added red band on floor, two turn of floor to wall and one at top of wall.
Curator's comments: The profile suggests a date towards the middle of the sixth century.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GA.2159)
